thread.title_full: Kennametal (KMT) in Focus: Stock Falls 6.2% - Yahoo Finance

author: Zacks Equity Research
title: Kennametal (KMT) in Focus: Stock Falls 6.2% - Yahoo Finance
text:
Kennametal Inc. (KMT) saw a big move last session, as the company’s shares fell by over 6% on the day. The move came on pretty good volume too with far more shares changing hands than in a normal session. This continues the recent downtrend for KMT, as the stock is now down over 8% since Jul 30, 2015. 

This slump shouldn’t be too much of a surprise to investors, as the company has seen 7 negative revisions in the past few weeks and its current year earnings consensus has moved lower over the last 30 days. This suggests there may be more trouble down the road. So make sure to keep an eye on this stock going forward to see if this recent slump will continue, as the earnings picture definitely suggests that this might be the case. 

KMT currently has a Zacks Rank #5 (Strong Sell) while its Earnings ESP is 0.00%. 


A better-ranked stock in the Industrial Products sector is AGCO Corporation (AGCO), holding a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy). 

Is KMT going up? Or down? Predict to see what others think: Up or Down
